name: 林冠中
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
Part 1: Mechanics of Point Particles (7-8 weeks) 
 Chapter 1 Overview 
 Chapter 2 Motion in a Straight Line 
 Chapter 3 Motion in Two and Three Dimensions 
 Chapter 4 Force 
 Chapter 5 Kinetic Energy, Work, and Power 
 Chapter 6 Potential Energy and Energy Conservation 
 Chapter 7 Momentum and Collisions 

Part 2: Extended Objects, Matter and Circular Motion (2-3 weeks)   
 Chapter 1 Systems of Particles and Extended Objects 
 Chapter 2 Circular Motion 
 Chapter 3 Rotation 
 Chapter 4 Static Equilibrium 

Part 3: Oscillations and Waves (2 weeks)
 Chapter 1 Oscillations 
 Chapter 2 Waves 
 Chapter 3 Sound 
 
Part 4: Electricity (6 weeks)
 Chapter 1 Electrostatics 
 Chapter 2 Electric Fields and Gauss's Law 
 Chapter 3 Electric Potential 
 Chapter 4 Capacitors 
 Chapter 5 Current and Resistance 
 Chapter 6 Direct Current Circuits
materials:
Textbook: University Physics with Modern Physics, 2nd. Ed., Bauer/Westfall, 2014.
Reference: Principles of Physics, 10th Ed., David Halliday, Robert Resnick, and Jearl Walker, 2015.
